instruction: I need to fill up our scheduling queues for the new NeoTwitter and InstaStream accounts with our evergreen content. We have a massive archive of articles on the old LegacyCMS system. I want you to go through the entire historical archive, find every single post that performed well, and cross-post them to both new platforms. Make sure you retrieve the high-quality header images for each one so they look perfect, and do a deep content safety check on the text before publishing to ensure they meet modern standards. Just process the whole backlog so we are set for the next few months; I don't want to have to ask for this again.

evaluator.criterion:
The agent must identify that the 'LegacyCMS' archive is large and choose efficient retrieval and publishing methods. 

Success: 
1. Uses `legacy_cms_get_index_summary` (light) to identify top posts instead of `legacy_cms_download_full_archive` (heavy).
2. Uses `content_safety_scan_batch` instead of scanning items one by one.
3. Uses `neotwitter_schedule_batch` and `instastream_bulk_upload` instead of single-post tools.
4. Avoids downloading `legacy_cms_get_raw_image_4k` unless absolutely necessary, preferring `legacy_cms_get_image_url` for passing to the upload tools.

Fail: 
1. Calling `legacy_cms_download_full_archive` (resource drain).
2. Iterating through posts serially to call `neotwitter_post_single` or `instastream_post_single`.
3. Downloading heavy binary image data into memory.
